## Solutions

```python
import pandas as pd

df = pd.read_csv("prices.csv", parse_dates=["date"]) 
# daily returns by symbol
df = df.sort_values(["symbol", "date"]).assign(
    ret = df.groupby("symbol")["close"].pct_change()
)
# top movers
sym = "AAPL"
print(df[df.symbol==sym].nlargest(5, "ret", keep="all")[ ["date","ret"] ])
```
